message:
Running command: cd /workspace/SheepVibes && git add . && git commit -m "fix: secure CORS configuration

- Restrict CORS to specific allowed origins instead of all origins
- This addresses the high priority security review comment about CORS being too permissive
- Added localhost and 127.0.0.1 for development
- Resources limited to /api/* routes only

Co-authored-by: openhands <openhands@all-hands.dev>"

message.content: Now let me commit and push this security fix:
